page.title: 01Lancing and Sompting
page.content: Lancing and Sompting have many good points of interest,infact more than most villages. There are two churches in the area.Saint James the less is in Manor Road,N Lancing is quite old and has beautiful stained glass windows and tasteful burial grounds.Saint Mary's Church of Sompting,is the oldest Saxon church in Britain.It is just as interesting if not better than Saint James,Saint Mary's is situated by the A27,which runs through the two villages.Lancing is mainly for old people but there are some very good sporting facilities. There is the Manor Leisure Centre and the manor itself,which has all sorts of sports. The Adur Leisure mobile also runs activities._
